title: Dambhaka bhaktige
sahitya:
Dambhaka bhaktige mecci koDanu krSNa


anupallavi

  DombalAgava hAki DONDoNDe horaLidarilla


caraNam 1    hecceccu bayasidarilla heccarige tatigilla kaccekai shuddhavillade karmavilla 
bacciTTarilla nirbhAgyarige indenna acyutAnanda shrIhariya nene kaNDya manave
    caraNam 2    keTTanendaru illa klEsha baTTaru illa aTTaDisi niSTUra Adidarilla 
vaTa vatane kapyendodari koNDaru illa beTTadinda talegeLage biddaru illa
    caraNam 3    kannaviTTaru illa kaDidADidaru illa kunniyantyAvAga kUgidaru illa 
tAne koDadannaka kosari koNDaru illa cenna purandara viTTalanna duritarilla
